title: Client won't launch.
body: I get the error message Bugsplat.dll whenever I try to launch it after having completed an AVG system cleanse (i noticed after i cleared my rubbish bin - f#@$) i've tried pasting a friends up to date bugsplat.dll folder into the "League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.112\deploy" folder however am still receiving the same launch fail message.

replies.body:
To anyone encountering this problem, I fixed it by taking the patch downloads and config, saving them seperately then deleting everything reinstalling the game and adding the prepatched files into the new folder - everything works fine now. Hope this helps!

~Hezz

Hey Hezzrin,

Can you upload your patcher logs to http://upload.wrenchmen.org/ and provide a link here? You can find instructions on how to find those logs [**here**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/howto/16?view=article). 

In the meantime, whatever solutions you can from [**this thread**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) and let me know if anything works.
